globalSettingsDescription.message: Please see also the settings at every account. Without them nothing will be archived automatically.

archiveTypeStartup.message: at every Thunderbird startup (and repeated after every day)

enableInfoLoggingOption.message: activate extended Logging (error console and file AutoarchiveReloadedLog.txt in your profile directory)

globalSettingsStartupDescription.message: Autoarchiving after Thunderbird start is not recommended for IMAP accounts, because there may be problems if the server/internet connection is missing (messages are archived twice).

settingsDescription2.message: Please also remember: Beside this options you also have to set up the Thunderbird archive settings under 'Copies & Folders'! Note: These settings are not available for feed accounts (e.g. RSS) or local folders. You can archive them only with default settings (or die set the globalen configs 'mail.identity.default.archive_granularity' / 'mail.identity.default.archive_keep_folder_structure' manually).

archiveMessages.message: Archive all other messages older than

archiveTagged.message: Archive tagged (with keywords) messages older than

archiveStarred.message: Archive messages marked (with a star) older than
